name: Oblivion In Nightmares (Scopy Jam)
description:
Pol Martin had gone to bed... and now he has awakened to a terrible curse, from some strange Entity. All his favorite things have been scattered in a rusted hellscape, with monsters trying to get him. Will he escape? or will he meet... Oblivion in Nightmares

Collect the food & Pol Tapes, then find the exit. (some of the required sounds are in the music)
